data.message: eminem are my favorite singer since I was little, I was 4 years old when I listened until now, I would like to see up close, I'm an Italian in a city called Palermo, I saw your movie 8 mile and I love him too good , I would like to ask you can not come in Italy? I know in 2001 they treated you badly but unfortunately Italy is so disgusts me I'm just become the country's largest'm in America, I love you eminem!, please come in the Italian city palermo want to see you!, great rapper eminem Hello, here in Italy you expect with seniority.
